title: Bitcoin Advocate Nic Carter Accuses ‘Laser-Eyed Maxis’ of Turning Bitcoin Into a ‘Secular Cult’
description: In a tweet this week, crypto advocate Nic Carter took aim at those who claim to be bitcoin enthusiasts but have been applauding the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) enforcement actions. Carter accused these individuals of turning Bitcoin into a “secular cult” and argued that the “vast majority” of them are actually newcomers to […]

title: Kraken NFT Launches as the Gateway to the World of NFTs
description: Kraken, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, has officially launched Kraken NFT, a platform that serves as a gateway for buying, selling, and exploring the world of non-fungible tokens (NFTs). After a successful beta testing phase, Kraken NFT has expanded its offerings to over 250 NFT collections, integrated the Polygon network for faster transactions, and introduced various ... Read more
